analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.10 (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of Mexicoin.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#26) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of Mexicoin.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#28) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Mexicoin.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#28-29) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of Mexicoin.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#48) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of Mexicoin.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#48-49) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Mexicoin.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#49) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of Mexicoin.approve (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#73) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Mexicoin.approve (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#73) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of Mexicoin.allowance (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of Mexicoin.allowance (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#83-86) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenContract' of Mexicoin.withdrawNotATokens (/unique_contracts/0xda017d3417d7fcdd4db134e2491f30292ec647c7.sol#104) is not in mixedCase
